Module gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core
Package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.datatype.markup.flexmark

Interface IMarkupWriter.ChildHandler<T,E extends Throwable>

Type Parameters:
T - the type of stream to write to
E - the type of exception that can be thrown when a writing error occurs
Enclosing interface:
IMarkupWriter<T,E extends Throwable>
Functional Interface:
This is a functional interface and can therefore be used as the assignment target for a lambda expression or method reference.
@FunctionalInterface public static interface IMarkupWriter.ChildHandler<T,E extends Throwable>
Provides a callback to handle node children.

      A callback used to process a given node.
      Parameters:
      node - the node to process
